items.title: Merry Christmas!
items.description: I just pulled this together from this morning so it's not perfect :/ but i hope it'll be fun nonetheless!

items.title: How to use
items.description: Double-click to add an item.You can change the title and description just by clicking and changing them. In fact, you can change anything just by clicking on it and typing!

items.title: Moving Items
items.description: You can drag items around with your mouse. Arrange your boyfriends from shortest (on the left) to tallest (on the right)!

items.title: Zach
items.description: maybe has PTSD from burning his tongue on xiaolongbao when he was younger?

items.title: New Views
items.description: Click the drop-down on the top left corner to create new views. Views allow you to arrange your (boyfriends) in different ways. Check out the views I've made earlier!
